MDX Reader - Your Professional Offline Dictionary Reader

A modern dictionary reading application designed for macOS, supporting MDX format dictionaries with complete offline functionality, privacy protection, and excellent user experience.

‚ú® Core Features

1. üìö Professional Dictionary Support

  • MDX 1.x / 2.0 Format: Full support for mainstream dictionary formats
  • MDD Resource Files: Multimedia resources including images, audio, and video
  • Multi-Encoding Support: Automatic detection of UTF-8, UTF-16, and GBK
  • Multi-Dictionary Search: Query across multiple dictionaries simultaneously

2. üîç Intelligent Search Experience

  • Real-time Search Suggestions: Instant results as you type
  • Smart Prefix Matching: Accurately find target entries
  • Search History: Save up to 30 recent queries for quick access
  • Keyboard Navigation: Arrow keys to navigate, Enter to confirm

3. üé® Elegant Interface Design

  • Beautiful Dark Mode: Eye-friendly for extended reading sessions
  • Polished Light Mode: Clear and bright for various environments
  • System Theme Following: Automatic switching for seamless experience
  • Highly Customizable:
    • Font selection (all system fonts available)
    • Font size adjustment (10-24px)
    • Line spacing adjustment (1.0-2.5x)
    • Custom content padding

4. ‚≠ê Powerful Management Features

  • Favorites Management: One-click to bookmark important entries
  • Organized by Dictionary: Clear categorical display
  • Quick Access: Tap history or favorites to view instantly
  • Smart Sorting: Most recent entries displayed first

5. üé§ Multi-language Text-to-Speech

  • System TTS Support: Uses native macOS speech engine
  • Automatic Language Detection: Intelligently recognizes Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, and more
  • Natural Pronunciation: Near human-like reading quality
  • One-Click Reading: Tap to hear pronunciation

6. üîí Privacy-First Design

  • 100% Offline Usage: No network connection required
  • Zero Data Collection: No tracking, uploading, or analytics
  • Local Storage: All data stays on your Mac
  • No Account Required: Open and use immediately, no registration
